name: TC_SD_005_removeItemFromCart_shouldEmptyCartAndHideBadge
description: Verify that removing an item from the cart empties it and hides the cart badge from the header.
descriptionHtml: Verify that removing an item from the cart empties it and hides the cart badge from the header.

testStage.description: Verify that removing an item from the cart empties it and hides the cart badge from the header.
